SEARCH
Package Global

Class Methods

java.lang.Object
Global.Methods
public class Methods extends Object
This class is a big one. It hosts a variety of methods that are meant to be used throughout the program.

A lot of the methods here are here for input validation for fields that need them. As the user inputs information in the field or tries to submit a form then this class will be used and the specific method or methods will be called using the data given to see if it is valid and return all the errors.

There are a couple other useful methods. One specifically is the method that will take the password from the field and convert it to a string. There is no need to constantly make it into a string now to use it, just need the specific method.
Also there is one that helps with item display as well

    • getPassword

      public static String getPassword(char[] password)
      Gets the password and makes it into a usable string with no need to do it yourself
      Parameters:
      password - The char sequence of the password field
      Returns:
      the password sequence converted into a string

    • checkUsername

      public static ArrayList<String> checkUsername(String username, boolean userCheck, boolean compare)
      Checks validation for a username
      Parameters:
      username - the given username
      userCheck - A true or false of wether it will check if the user already exists. Only should be ran when trying to submit to the database.
      compare - a true or false only to check if the username is the same as it previously was.
      Returns:
      An array list of validation errors

    • checkPassword

      public static ArrayList<String> checkPassword(String password)
      Validates the password
      Parameters:
      password - The password string. Run The get password method to get this string easier.
      Returns:
      An array list of validation errors

    • checkCode

      public static ArrayList<String> checkCode(JTextField codeField, boolean submitting, boolean comparing)
      A method to check the discount code
      Parameters:
      codeField - A TextField that hosts the given discount code
      submitting - A true or false of wether or not its being submitted for checking
      comparing - This is to check if we are comparing it to the code we had previously or not
      Returns:
      An array list of validation errors

    • checkForErrors

      public static void checkForErrors(ArrayList<String> errors, JLabel errorMessage)
      Checks an array list of errors given and sets visibility of messages and message text depending on the list size and objects. Used for displaying error messages for validation
      Parameters:
      errors - ArrayList of error messages
      errorMessage - The JLabel that will display the given error if there are any

    • displayItem

      public static void displayItem(int index)
      Displays a game with the correct options and information depending on the view the user is in.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the chosen item in the list
